newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla fed cattle lightly traded at $71 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla fed cattle lightly traded at $71 - USDA.

text.p: Trade slow in the panhandle area Thursday. Slaughter steers and heifers steady in light test.

Feedlots reported moderate inquiry from buyers. Sales reported on 3,200 slaughter steers and 1,900 heifers; 84,600 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 15,400 formulated and 3,600 head previously contracted to be shipped this week.
Wk to Date: 84,600 Week Ago: 54,800 Year Ago: 91,000
Slaughter Steers: Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 71.00. Pen Select, few Choice 2-3 1150 lbs 70.50.
Slaughter Heifers: Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1150 lbs 71.00. Pen Select, few Choice 203 1050 lbs 70.00. Utility and Choice 2-4 1100-1200 lbs including heiferettes 64.00-65.00.
